text: A Girl in Every Port is a 1928 American romantic comedy movie directed by Howard Hawks and starring Victor McLaglen, Robert Armstrong, Louise Brooks, Natalie Joyce, Francis McDonald, Leila Hyams, Natalie Kingston, Sally Rand. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was remade in 1931 as Goldie. ==Other websites== * * Category:1928 comedy movies Category:1920s romance movies Category:1920s romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in France
title: A Girl in Every Port (1928 movie)
